channel.title: Tales from the Loop: Technicolour Swap Shop
channel.description:
I'll be running 4 sessions of Tales from the Loop in June.
We will be playing with Boulder City as the setting. Sessions will last for 3 hours and will be recorded for Youtube
I will be using Roll20 for character sheets and Dice Rolling.
Episode 1: [date=2019-06-02 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] → [date=2019-06-02 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LeDZWzfIClzo5KVO2d5 Episode 2: [date=2019-06-09 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] → [date=2019-06-09 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LeDZf5SrWgri1ZtkQRR *No game Sunday, June 16th 2019, 8:00 pm British time (I'm at a larp event)* Episode 3: [date=2019-06-23 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] → [date=2019-06-23 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LeDZnaaUZDzHmni7mrD Episode 4: [date=2019-06-30 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] → [date=2019-06-30 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LeDZyI6Zt_ssyvLZXxe

I’ll be running 4 sessions of Tales from the Loop in June.

We will be playing with Boulder City as the setting. Sessions will last for 3 hours and will be recorded for Youtube

I will be using Roll20 for character sheets and Dice Rolling.
